name: The Labyrinth
short_description:
Super Important: I have stopped working on the game but i may come back to it later. When downloading the source you will get more info about this.
If you want to continue the project contact sanderk99@gmail.com. But you must know how to
program in c++
A text-based labyrinth game. Here you can read about news: http://www.eclipseprogramming.wordpress.com IMPORANT: There is currently no way to beat the game because i haven`t programmed the whole game.
